chunk:
Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: 15% Vitamin C, Zinc Oxide, Blueberry Seed Oil, Naturally Hemp-Derived Broad Spectrum CBD, Niacinamide (Vit B3), Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E

Directions: Use pipette to measure out a dime-sized amount. Apply to your face in a gentle, circular motion. Let is absorb before adding moisturizer.
book: 1184-MOOD Skin Care DEFEND FACE + HAND SERUM

chunk: Warnings: See website for full details. Discontinue use if skin irritation occurs. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse with water. Keep out of reach of children. Consult your doctor before use if pregnant.
book: 1184-MOOD Skin Care DEFEND FACE + HAND SERUM

chunk: Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
